subject: RE: [junit] RE: Test Coverage Analysis Tool For Junit
msgSnippet: How about JTest?  It works well with Junit. ... From: Michael Silverstein To: junit@yahoogroups.com Sent: 4/24/2001 7:02 AM Subject: [junit] RE: Test Coverage
messageBody:
RE: [junit] RE: Test Coverage Analysis Tool For Junit

How about JTest?  It works well with Junit.

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Silverstein
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: 4/24/2001 7:02 AM
Subject: [junit] RE: Test Coverage Analysis Tool For Junit

The newest version of Test Mentor adds method coverage metrics and the
ability to run JUnit tests.

More info about Test Mentor and JUnit at:
http://www.javatesting.com/documentation/stmjunit.pdf
